dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, hey, did you catch the news about, um, ocean conservation? Big pledges coming in.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, hey, did you catch the news about, um, ocean conservation? Big pledges coming in.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, I saw that! Bloomberg Philanthropies and OceanX, right? It's like, a huge amount of money.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, I saw that! Bloomberg Philanthropies and OceanX, right? It's like, a huge amount of money.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Michael Bloomberg Bloomberg Philanthropies confirmed that it is committing $86 million over four years, and OceanX said it is pledging about $100 million over the same period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly! Over, what was it, four years? Bloomberg's putting in $86 million and OceanX, uh, another hundred million. So, like, almost $200 million total.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! Over, what was it, four years? Bloomberg's putting in eighty six million dollars and OceanX, uh, another hundred million. So, like, almost two hundred million dollars total.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Michael Bloomberg Bloomberg Philanthropies confirmed that it is committing $86 million over four years, and OceanX said it is pledging about $100 million over the same period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Yeah, I mean, that's serious cash. And it's all aimed at, like, tackling pollution, um, destructive fishing, climate change, all the big stuff impacting our oceans.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I mean, that's serious cash. And it's all aimed at, like, tackling pollution, um, destructive fishing, climate change, all the big stuff impacting our oceans.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: They aim to combat the impact of pollution, destructive fishing practices and climate change on the ocean, which makes up more than two-thirds of the Earths surface.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. And the article mentioned they want to support exploration too, for science and public awareness. Because, you know, there's this huge disconnect.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. And the article mentioned they want to support exploration too, for science and public awareness. Because, you know, there's this huge disconnect.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Together, the organizations will support the exploration of threatened marine areas to advance scientific understanding, public awareness and education, advocacy and conservation. The partnership is based on the premise that there is a disconnect between humans and their relationship to the ocean, and that threats to the ocean are increasing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And when you think about it, uh, billions of people depend on the ocean for food and livelihoods. It's not just, like, some far-off problem.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And when you think about it, uh, billions of people depend on the ocean for food and livelihoods. It's not just, like, some far-off problem.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: More than three billion people depend on the oceans for food and their livelihoods, Bloomberg said in a statement on Sunday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, not at all. It was announced at a conference in Indonesia, I think?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, not at all. It was announced at a conference in Indonesia, I think?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The partnership was announced on Sunday Oct. 28 at the 5th Annual Our Ocean Conference in Indonesia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the Our Ocean Conference. And it actually came right after this really cool expedition they did.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the Our Ocean Conference. And it actually came right after this really cool expedition they did.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bloomberg, UN special envoy for climate action and a former New York City mayor, and Dalio, founder of hedge fund firm Bridgewater Associates, made the announcement at the conclusion of a recent joint project, an expedition to the U.S.s first national marine monument in the Atlantic Ocean, called the Northeast Canyons and Seamounts Marine National Monument.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, the one to the Northeast Canyons and Seamounts Marine National Monument? In the Atlantic?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, the one to the Northeast Canyons and Seamounts Marine National Monument? In the Atlantic?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...an expedition to the U.S.s first national marine monument in the Atlantic Ocean, called the Northeast Canyons and Seamounts Marine National Monument.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's the one! On OceanX's vessel, the Alucia. They explored parts that, like, had never been visited by humans before.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the one! On OceanX's vessel, the Alucia. They explored parts that, like, had never been visited by humans before.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The expedition made on OceanXs vessel, the Alucia, explored parts of the underwater site that had never been visited by humans.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, kind of a "start in your own backyard" approach before inspiring others, huh?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So, kind of a start in your own backyard approach before inspiring others, huh?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By starting in our own backyard, we hope to inspire Americans and others around the world as they conserve their own national waters, Bloomberg said in a video on Sunday announcing the partnership.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Precisely. I mean, it's pretty powerful messaging, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Precisely. I mean, it's pretty powerful messaging, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. It's really encouraging to see this level of commitment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. It's really encouraging to see this level of commitment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Our oceans, uh, they desperately need this attention.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Our oceans, uh, they desperately need this attention.
